channel.title: Sorry, loading char ! client wont work!
channel.description:
hi ...again as of last night i posted an ip problem...well i got rid of that client and got a new 1 demises client .. but i changed the ip in client.java so it looks like this
public static String server = "5.211.60.109"; // ip - 5.211.60.109 localhost
5.211.60.109 is my hamachi ip but when i gave my brother the client he got a message sorry, loading char, please try logging inh again what is the problem ? please help ty

item.title: Sorry, loading char ! client wont work!
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

hi …again
as of last night i posted an ip problem…well i got rid of that client and got a new 1
demises client …
but i changed the ip in client.java so it looks like this

public static String server = "5.211.60.109"; // ip - 5.211.60.109 localhost
5.211.60.109 is my hamachi ip

but when i gave my brother the client he got a message
sorry, loading char, please try logging inh again
what is the problem ?
please help
ty
